summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Cleopatra Place, from West 70th Street to a point 40 feet north of the north line of Block 2, Peterson's Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12726 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
